subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chien-Ming Wang allowed one hit over six scoreless innings, Jonny Gomes hit a two-run homer and the Washington Nationals beat the Cubs, 3-1, on Tuesday night in Chicago.
snippet: Chien-Ming Wang allowed one hit over six scoreless innings, Jonny Gomes hit a two-run homer and the Washington Nationals beat the Cubs, 3-1, on Tuesday night in Chicago.
